summary: A collection of unit tests that verify the correctness and robustness of various text conversion utilities, including container-to-bytes, container-to-text, JSON encoding fallback, JSON serialization, and generic string/bytes transformations, with emphasis on encoding options and error handling.
business_intent: Validate that Ansible's text conversion helpers work reliably across different data types and encoding scenarios, preventing runtime errors and ensuring proper serialization of configuration data.
